name: 21c Museum Hotel
description: Art is everywhere at 21c. Follow the clues on our iSPY game to see if you can ﬁnd all of the artworks; immerse yourself in the art of the 21st century and enjoy works by local artists in Labor&Materials, and our other exhibitions.
availability_desc: Open 24/7; Guided tours most Wednesdays and Fridays, 5p; and June 11; July 9; August 6, 13, 11:30a

name: Actors Theatre of Louisville
description: A 30-minute sneak peek behind-the-scenes tour through an interactive onstage demonstration. Includes a variety of hands-on activities that engage kids of all ages in the exciting world of theatre.

name: American Printing House for the Blind
description: The interactive museum explores how ingenuity and determination combine to overcome vision loss.  A tour of the factory demonstrates the making of braille, large type, audio books, and educational aids.
availability_desc: Mondays through Fridays, 8:30a-4p, Sat 10a-3p;  Factory Tours, Mondays through Thursdays, 10a and 2p

name: Arts Alliance of Southern Indiana
description: Gallery in the historic district of New Albany, showcasing child-friendly work. Each Saturday will have a craft, talk or activity.

name: ArtSeed
description: Local artist-owned and operated gallery in New Albany, showcasing an artist members’ exhibit called Celebration of Family.

name: Asia Institute, Inc.
description: Access to two art exhibits, Rivers and Teas of Asia, with themed hands-on activities.

name: Bernheim Arboretum and Research Forest
description: Have a GIANT adventure as you hike through Bernheim to ﬁnd Mama Loumari, Little Nis, and Little Elina – our family of Forest Giants in a Giant Forest. Start at the Visitor Center for your stamp and a map.

name: Bullitt County Public Library
description: SummerQuest – Enjoy events and reading  challenges for all ages.

name: Carnegie Center for Art and History
description: A regional art and history museum with hands-on activities in charming New Albany, featuring the Men & Women of the Underground Railroad exhibit.

name: Charlestown-Clark County Public Library
description: A Universe of Stories – Summer Reading Program & Activities.
